selectWorld.backupWarning.experimental: Minecraft has detected an unknown presence in this world. It is advised that you DO NOT PASS THIS SCREEN. Ignoring this warning may result in strange occurrences and/or encounters. Remember, don't stare directly at the bugs.
config.text.prevent_open: Sorry, you can't open a config right now because another one is already open.
painting.a_distant_memory.title: A Distant Memory.
painting.watching.title: Watching...
painting.redstone_halls.title: Redstone Halls
config.page.vanishing_delay.description: The Vanishing Delay setting allows players to adjust how long Herobrine lingers after a sighting. This ensures that even those who might have trouble noticing him can still experience his unsettling presence.
config.page.sightings.description: Sightings are the foundation of From the Fog, serving as the core mechanic that brings eerie encounters to life. These unsettling moments occur randomly, creating the impression that he is always watching, yet never fully there.
config.page.skin_library.description: The Skin Library offers a variety of Herobrine appearances for use during sightings. Players can choose a specific skin to suit their preference or let the mod randomly select one for added unpredictability. This customization enhances the eerie atmosphere and keeps encounters fresh and unique.
config.page.burning_base.description: The Burning Base mechanic is an ominous event where Herobrine sets the player's base ablaze. Without warning or reason, he leaves behind destruction. This mechanic creates a sense of unease, as no place feels truly safe from his reach.
config.page.malevolent_shrine.descriptio: Herobrine's shrine is a classic Herobrine structure that players can build to provoke him. Building one of these shrines is an easy way to initiate Herobrine's eerie activities without waiting for the default 3 day timer.
config.page.disappearing_torches.descrip: Disappearing Torches creates an unsettling atmosphere by making torches vanish without explanation. This sudden loss of light leaves areas darker and more perilous, heightening the tension. It serves as a quiet reminder of Herobrineâ€™s presence, subtly disrupting your sense of security.
config.page.dreadful_donation.descriptio: Dreadful Donations involve Herobrine leaving unsettling gifts in players' chests. These mysterious offerings serve as a chilling reminder of his presence, blurring the line between generosity and menace.
config.page.leafless_grove.description: Leafless Groves are haunting areas where trees stand barren, stripped of all their leaves. These lifeless patches of forest serve as an unsettling sign of Herobrine's presence, adding to the world's eerie atmosphere.
config.page.structures.description: The structures that Herobrine places are unsettling landmarks that appear throughout the world. These eerie creations heighten the tension, leaving players questioning their origins and purpose.
config.setting.creeping_sighting.descrip: Spawns standing behind you waiting for you to turn around.
config.setting.dwelling_sighting.descrip: Spawns watching you just out of view from the darkest corners of your caves.
config.setting.stalking_sighting.descrip: Spawns standing anywhere around you stalking you from a distance.
config.setting.lurking_sighting.descript: Spawns lurking around you watching from a very far distance.
config.setting.nightmare_sighting.descri: Appears at the foot of your bed when you sleep, watching.
Changes how long it takes for Herobrine to disappear after being caught creeping up on the player.
Changes how long it takes for Herobrine to disappear after being caught dwelling in a cave.
Changes how long it takes for Herobrine to disappear after being caught stalking the player.
config.setting.lurking_vanishing_delay.d: Changes how long it takes for Herobrine to disappear after being caught lurking around the player.
config.setting.sighting_frequency.descri: Adjusts the frequency of Herobrine appearing. (Spawn rate doubles at night.)
config.setting.burning_base.description: Herobrine will try to burn your house down once you leave the area. (One check every 5 minutes.)
config.setting.burning_base_chance.descr: Changes the chance that Herobrine will successfully burn down your house.
config.setting.disappearing_torches.desc: Herobrine will try to break your torches once you leave the area. (One check every 5 minutes.)
config.setting.disappearing_torches_chan: Changes the chance that Herobrine will successfully break your torches.
config.setting.sudden_scare.description: Enables the ability for Herobrine to jumpscare the player when they collide with him.
config.setting.malicious_malfunction.des: Causes the game to crash on jumpscare. [EPILEPSY WARNING!] [NOT FOR WEAKER MACHINES!]
config.setting.rekindling_shrine.descrip: Changes whether or not Herobrine will relight doused shrines if you walk away for too long.
config.setting.shrine_strike.description: Changes whether or not lightning strikes when activating a Herobrine shrine.
config.setting.shrine_surprise.descripti: Changes whether or not Herobrine will appear on top of your shrine when lit.
config.setting.haunting_delay.descriptio: Changes the delay for how long it takes for Herobrine to start major haunting (in-game days).
config.setting.dreadful_donation.descrip: Changes whether or not Herobrine will leave you gifts in your chests. (One check every 5 minutes)
Changes the chance that Herobrine will successfully leave you gifts.
config.setting.haunted_heirlooms.descrip: Changes whether or not Herobrine will leave you custom paintings and music discs when donating.
config.setting.lurking_language.descript: Changes the language that Herobrine communicates in. (Used when he places signs or leaves donations.)
config.setting.sighting_noise.descriptio: Changes whether or not a noise is played when you spot Herobrine. (50% chance.)
config.setting.nametag.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine has a nametag and how it appears.
config.setting.no_sleep.description: Makes Herobrine prevent you from sleeping when he's nearby. (Will not work on peaceful.)
config.setting.leafless_grove.descriptio: Herobrine will remove the leaves from forests that you've visited. (One check every 5 minutes.)
config.setting.leafless_grove_chance.des: Changes the chance that Herobrine will remove leaves from forests that you've visited.
config.setting.window_watcher.descriptio: Toggles whether or not Herobrine will continue watching the player when spotted through a window.
config.setting.mossy_pyramid.description: Changes whether or not Herobrine will place mossy pyramids in the forests of your world.
config.setting.letter.description: When enabled, Herobrine will place large glowstone letters in the plains and deserts of your world.
config.setting.dwelling_shadow.descripti: If a dwelling Herobrine spawns in the dark, he will refuse to disappear while in the darkness.
